GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object containing the article with the ID number passed

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array containing all the comments for the article with the ID number passed

article.body: This is a bad article name
article.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: inserts a new comment into the comments table, responds with the posted comment object

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates an article with the article ID passed

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment with the comment ID passed

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users
